00029    /* 
00030    * Constructor
00031    */
00032    RingTetraRebridgeMove::RingTetraRebridgeMove(McSystem& system) : 
00033       GroupRebridgeBase(system),
00034       speciesId_(-1),
00035       nAtom_(0),
00036       upperBridge_(0),
00037       lowerBridge_(0)
00038    {} 
00039    
00040    /* 
00041    * Read parameters speciesId, and bridgeLength_
00042    */
00043    void RingTetraRebridgeMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00044    {
00045       // Read parameters
00046       readProbability(in);
00047       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00048       read<double>(in, "upperBridge", upperBridge_);
00049       read<double>(in, "lowerBridge", lowerBridge_);
00050 
00051       // Use dynamic_cast to check that the Species is actually a Linear species
00052       Ring* ringPtr;
00053       ringPtr = dynamic_cast<Ring*>(&(simulation().species(speciesId_)));
00054 
00055       // Allocate Vector array storing atom positions.
00056       nAtom_ = system().simulation().species(speciesId_).nAtom();
00057       if (nAtom_ < 4) UTIL_THROW("nAtom < 4 for tetra rebridge move.");
00058       R_.allocate(nAtom_); 
00059 
00060    }
00061 
00062 
00063    /* 
00064    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Monte Carlo move.
00065    *
00066    * A complete move involve the following stepts:
00067    *
00068    *    1) choose a molecule-i randomly;
00069    *    2) find molecule-j of the same type as i, and monomer pairs satisfying
00070    *       the distance criterion exist;
00071    *
00072    */
00073    bool RingTetraRebridgeMove::move() 
00074    {
00075       Molecule *molPtr;    // pointer to the rebridging molecule
00076       Atom     *aPtr, *bPtr, *cPtr, *dPtr; // atom pointers
00077       Atom     *lPtr, *hPtr, *lTmp, *hTmp;
00078       Vector   swapV;
00079       int      ia, ic, ib, id;
00080       int      ibc, ida, iLow, iHigh, nSwap;
00081       int      bondType;
00082       double   energy;
00083       bool     found, accept;
00084 
00085       incrementNAttempt();
00086 
00087       // Randomly pick up a molecule.
00088       molPtr = &(system().randomMolecule(speciesId_));
00089 
00090       // Randomly choose the a atom in the tetra-group.
00091       ia = random().uniformInt(0, nAtom_);
00092 
00093       // Search the rebriding sites.
00094       found = scanBridge(molPtr, ia, ic);
00095       if (!found) return false;
00096 
00097       ib = modId(ia+1, nAtom_);
00098       id = modId(ic+1, nAtom_);
00099 
00100       // Calcuate the energy change.
00101       aPtr = &(molPtr->atom(ia));
00102       bPtr = &(molPtr->atom(ib));
00103       cPtr = &(molPtr->atom(ic));
00104       dPtr = &(molPtr->atom(id));
00105 
00106       bondType = molPtr->bond(ia).typeId();
00107       tetraEnergy(aPtr, bPtr, cPtr, dPtr, bondType, energy);
00108 
00109       // Decide whether to accept or reject.
00110       accept = random().metropolis(boltzmann(energy));
00111 
00112       if (accept) {
00113 
00114          // Find the shorter half loop.
00115          ibc = ic - ib; 
00116          if (ibc < 0) ibc += nAtom_;
00117 
00118          ida = ia - id; 
00119          if (ida < 0) ida += nAtom_;
00120 
00121          if (ibc <= ida) {
00122             lPtr = bPtr;
00123             hPtr = cPtr;
00124             iLow = ib;
00125             iHigh = ic;
00126             if (ibc%2 == 0)
00127                nSwap = ibc / 2;
00128             else
00129                nSwap = (ibc + 1) / 2;
00130          } else {
00131             lPtr = dPtr;
00132             hPtr = aPtr;
00133             iLow = id;
00134             iHigh = ia;
00135             if (ida%2 == 0)
00136                nSwap = ida / 2;
00137             else
00138                nSwap = (ida + 1) / 2;
00139          }
00140 
00141          // Swap positions.
00142          for (int j = 0; j < nSwap; ++j) {
00143             // moving pointer close to the atom with higher index 
00144             hTmp = hPtr + modId(iHigh - j, nAtom_) - iHigh;
00145 
00146             // moving pointer close to the atom with lower index
00147             lTmp = lPtr + modId(iLow + j, nAtom_) - iLow;
00148 
00149             swapV = lTmp->position();
00150 
00151             //system().moveAtom(*lTmp, hTmp->position());
00152             lTmp->position() = hTmp->position();
00153             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*lTmp);
00154 
00155             //system().moveAtom(*hTmp, swapV);
00156             hTmp->position() = swapV;
00157             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*hTmp);
00158 
00159          }
00160 
00161          // Increment counter for accepted moves of this class.
00162          incrementNAccept();
00163 
00164       }
00165 
00166       return accept;
00167    }
00168 
00169    /*
00170    * Scan the valid rebridging sits.
00171    */
00172    bool RingTetraRebridgeMove::
00173    scanBridge(Molecule* molPtr, int ia, int &ic)
00174    {
00175       Vector    r1, r2, dR;
00176       int       ib, id, i;
00177       int       *idList, nGroup;
00178       double    lenSq, minSq, maxSq;
00179       bool      found;
00180 
00181       // Preparation.
00182       found = false;
00183       maxSq = upperBridge_ * upperBridge_;
00184       minSq = lowerBridge_ * lowerBridge_;
00185 
00186       // b Atom id.
00187       ib = modId(ia+1, nAtom_);
00188       r1 = molPtr->atom(ia).position();
00189       r2 = molPtr->atom(ib).position();
00190 
00191       // Check the ab bond.
00192       lenSq = boundary().distanceSq(r1, r2);
00193       if (lenSq >= maxSq || lenSq <= minSq) {
00194          ic = -1;       // invalid value
00195          return found;
00196       }
00197 
00198       // Retrace the non-periodic molecule shape.
00199       R_[0] = molPtr->atom(0).position();
00200       for (i = 1; i < nAtom_; ++i) {
00201          r1 = molPtr->atom(i-1).position();
00202          r2 = molPtr->atom(i).position();
00203          system().boundary().distanceSq(r2, r1, dR);
00204          R_[i].add(R_[i-1], dR);
00205       }
00206 
00207       // Loop over all monomers to find the proper rebridging sites.
00208       nGroup = 0;
00209       idList = new int[nAtom_ - 3];
00210       for (i = 1; i < nAtom_ - 2; ++i) {
00211          ic = modId(ib+i,nAtom_);
00212          id = modId(ic+1,nAtom_);
00213 
00214          // Distance test.
00215          dR.subtract(R_[ia],R_[ic]);
00216          lenSq = dR.square();
00217          if (lenSq > minSq && lenSq < maxSq) {
00218 
00219          dR.subtract(R_[id],R_[ic]);
00220          lenSq = dR.square();
00221          if (lenSq > minSq && lenSq < maxSq) {
00222 
00223          dR.subtract(R_[id],R_[ib]);
00224          lenSq = dR.square();
00225          if (lenSq > minSq && lenSq < maxSq) {
00226 
00227             idList[nGroup] = ic; 
00228             ++nGroup;
00229 
00230          }
00231          }
00232          }
00233 
00234       } // Loop over all possible c atoms.
00235 
00236       if (nGroup > 0) {
00237          found = true;
00238          ic = idList[random().uniformInt(0,nGroup)];
00239       } else {
00240          found = false;
00241          ic = -1;         // Invalid value.
00242       }
00243 
00244       delete [] idList;
00245       return found;
00246 
00247    }
00248    
00249 }
